poemsDataJson.list_full: 住(すみ)の江(え)の 岸(きし)に寄(よ)る波(なみ) よるさへや 夢(ゆめ)の通(かよ)ひ路(ぢ) 人目(ひとめ)よくらむ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: The waves are gathered//On the shore of Sumi Bay,//And in the gathered night,//When in dreams I go to you,//I hide from people's eyes.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Sumi no e no|Kishi ni yoru nami|Yoru sae ya|Yume no kayoi-ji|Hitome yoku ran
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ゆめのかよひち ひとめよくらむ
poemsDataJson.author: 藤原敏行朝臣(ふじわらのとしゆきあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 夢においても人目を忍ぶ恋のもどかしさ
